Articles.Content:
Hello! I started this account about a month ago, but I'm making an official introduction here. I've seen how forums work, so I don't think I'll have any trouble getting comfortable here.

I've really enjoyed the game, much like everyone else, so I would like to show some pics of what I've done:

...

Darn. Apparently, my posting permissions won't allow it. Ah well, hopefully some other time.
Welcome aboard! Keep posting and you'll clear that hurdle soon enough.

If I recall correctly, it's a security method to prevent spam. A few more posts, and you'll have normal permissions.

Anyway, Welcome to the forums!
Ok, thanks for the info on that! I was confused how that worked.
